CHAT.comment: Book Reading; The Very Hungry Caterpillar

Chi reads at the table with Mot watching from a few feet away; Chi is a pretty competent reader I'd say -- I think he uses both print and context to help him get through; after apple Mot says he's not reading the words and says to follow word with finger; Mot's comments include sound it out put your finger under it , encouraging remarks , and occasionally giving the word; context notes mention subtle encouragement like smiling and nodding; one thing that strikes me is Chi's questioning tone when he knows he's guessing , and guessing wrong

u.a: reading at table Mot watching from a few feet away
MOT puts finger on book to show
Chi puts finger back on book to guide
MOT puts finger on book to show
MOT watches reaches over to touch word when Chi falters , subtle encouragement: smiles , nods , mmhmms
